DOC.brief_summary: Recent study report feasibility , effectiveness even less complication use NIV preoxygenation tracheal intubation ICU Operating Room . None study do emergency out-of-hospital medical rescue . This trial attempt demonstrate result even condition .
DOC.brief_title: Preoxygenation Before Prehospital Tracheal Intubation With NIV Versus Balloon
DOC.detailed_description: This trial compare classical preoxygenation strategy unidirectional valve autofilling balloon versus NIV .
DOC.criteria: Patients need chest tube intubation Cardiac arrest Children Pregnancy Incompetents
DOC.keyword: patient need tracheal chest tube manage Medical Mobile Emergency rescue service
